text: 13.9 Lom 14.17, Epe 4.14, Kol 2.4, 2.8, 2.16, 1 Ti 4.3 Binɨb ogɨnap takaw ke agɨl, ag amɨl apɨl gel, takaw anɨb ak gos nɨbop gɨ tɨmel gek kanɨb tep adek ak kelɨgɨnɨgabɨm tek lɨnɨmuŋ. God ne chɨnop yɨmug nɨŋɨd gɨtep gek, gos chɨn nab ayaŋ kɨles gɨl yonɨmuŋ ak, anɨb ak nep tep yɨbɨl. Tap ñɨŋeb ma ñɨŋeb takaw ak pen, gos chɨn nab ayaŋ kɨles gɨnɨmuŋ tek ma lup. Binɨb okok tap ak ñɨŋeb, tap ak ma ñɨŋeb agɨl, asɨk mosɨk gɨ mɨdebal ak pen, tap anɨb okok gek mɨdtep ma gɨpal.
